text:
e="preserve">Anri Mikhail-ipa Jergenia (; 8 August 1941 – 5 January 2020) was an Abkhazian politician. From June 2001 to November 2002 he was the Prime Minister. He was a presidential candidate for the 2004 election. He was born in Leningrad, Russian SFSR. He was a member of the Amtsakhara.
Jergenia died in Moscow on 5 January 2020 at the age of 78.
